title: About Me
description: Hello World!, I'm Ege Ã–zler, a Software Engineer with a strong focus on creating user experiences through modern web technologies. Currently working as a Front-End Developer, and pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science at Georgia Institute of Technology, specializing in Interactive Intelligence. This year I have broaden my knowledge in the area of Web3, specifically in Ordinals. My expertise lies in JavaScript/TypeScript and contemporary frameworks, where I excel at developing responsive, performant web applications. I'm particularly passionate about implementing clean, maintainable code and staying at the forefront of web development trends. My academic background in Interactive Intelligence complements my practical development skills, allowing me to approach problems with both technical precision and innovative thinking.
